sentences.en: A fishing vessel and a cargo ship collided in rough seas.
sentences.cn: 一艘捕鱼船和一艘货船在波涛汹涌的海上相撞了。

sentences.en: A lot of people discharged the cargo from a ship.
sentences.cn: 许多人从船上卸下货物.

sentences.en: An oil tanker spewed its cargo into the sea.
sentences.cn: 一艘油轮将装载的油全都泄入了大海。

sentences.en: Ferries are very powerful and manoeuvrable compared to cargo ships.
sentences.cn: 与货船相比，渡船马力大而且易操纵。

sentences.en: Fire may have breached the cargo tanks and set the oil ablaze.
sentences.cn: 大火当时有可能把货船上的油罐烧漏了，从而引燃原油。

sentences.en: He loaded his vessel with another cargo and set sail.
sentences.cn: 他给自己的船装上另一批货后便启航了。

sentences.en: Last night a cargo ship collided with a tanker carrying crude oil.
sentences.cn: 昨晚一艘货轮与一艘载着原油的油轮相撞.

sentences.en: Once the cargo has been shipped, insurance can be covered instantaneously.
sentences.cn: 货物一旦发出, 我会立即投保.

sentences.en: The cargo was due to be offloaded in Singapore three days later.
sentences.cn: 货物定于3天后在新加坡卸载。

sentences.en: The freighter carries a few passengers in addition to its cargo.
sentences.cn: 这艘货船除了货物之外还载有一些乘客.

sentences.en: The tanker began to spill its cargo of oil.
The transportation took off with its cargo at midnight.
sentences.cn: 运输机载着货物深夜起飞了.

sentences.en: The vessel is fully loaded with cargo for Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 这艘船满载货物驶往上海.

sentences.en: This port can handle up to 50000000 tons of cargo every year.
sentences.cn: 这个港口每年可吞吐50000000吨货物.

sentences.en: We have to make three loads of the cargo.
sentences.cn: 我们得把货物分成3批装运.

phrases.tran_cn: 货物码头；货运终点站；货运枢纽
货物运输保险；货运保险
集装箱货物；货柜装货物
一般货物，普通货物；杂货

trans.tran_en: the goods that are being carried in a ship or plane
